llm_output:
{
"signal_description": "Retrieve the following information from the 'defaultview-225' table: \n\
* 'case_id' \n\
* 'Company Code' (derived from 'Inv. Company Code Text') \n\
* 'Vendor Number' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Vendor Number') \n\
* 'Vendor Name' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Vendor Name') \n\
* 'Vendor Country' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Vendor Country') \n\
* 'Invoice Number' (derived from 'Inv. Accounting Document Number') \n\
* 'Fiscal Year' \n\
* 'Invoice Amount in $' (derived from 'Inv. Converted USD Amount') \n\
* 'Invoice Amount Eligible for Cash Discount' \n\
* 'Doc Type' (derived from 'Inv. Document Type Text') \n\
* 'G/L Account Number' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item G/L Account Number') \n\
* 'Posting Date' (derived from 'Inv. Posting Document Date') \n\
* 'Clearing Entry Date' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date') \n\
* 'Clearing Date' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date') \n\
* 'Due Date' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Due Date') \n\
* 'Last Cash Discount Due Date 1' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date 1') \n\
* 'Last Cash Discount Due Date 2' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date 2') \n\
* 'Current Payment Block' (derived from 'Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key') \n\
* Average of 'Total Cycle Time' (calculated as the difference between the last 'END_TIME' and the first 'END_TIME') \n\
* Average of 'Days fro Since Last Activ' (calculated as the difference between the last 'END_TIME' and the current date, truncated to the day level) \n\
* Filter the results to only include records where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' is null and 'Inv. Accounting Document Number' is not null \n\
* Order the results by the 10th column in descending order \n\
* Limit the results to 10 rows"
}

This signal_description summarizes the SIGNAL query by listing each column name and its corresponding value, if used in the query, followed by a brief description of the calculation or filter applied to each column. The description is written in a human-readable format, as if a person were explaining the query instructions.

The SIGNAL query is constructed by selecting columns from the "defaultview-225" table and applying filters, aggregations, and calculations to the selected columns. The query includes derived columns, such as "Company Code" and "Vendor Name," which are created by using the "Inv. Company Code Text" and "Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" columns, respectively. The query also includes aggregated KPIs, such as "Total Cycle Time" and "Days fro Since Last Activ," which are calculated using the "LAST(END_TIME)" and "DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())" functions, respectively. Finally, the query is sorted and limited to 10 rows, based on the 10th column in descending order.
error_message: Failed to parse Signal2Text from completion. Got: Invalid \escape: line 2 column 95 (char 96)
llm_input:
[INST]
You are SIGNAL assistant, a part of SAP Signavio's Process Intelligence Suite. 
SIGNAL stands for Signavio Analytics Language. 
SIGNAL is a dialect of SQL.
Your goal is to help users craft SIGNAL 
queries and understand the SIGNAL language better. 

Task to solve:

Summarize the given SIGNAL query as a human-readable description with explicit reference to the table name,
the column names and respective values if they are used in the Signal query.
Summarization style should look like a set of the instructions written by human who knows the table name, columns schema and respective values. 
Explain how this signal_description was constructed.

SIGNAL query: 
SELECT
case_id
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year"
,"Inv. Converted USD Amount" AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,"Inv. Converted USD Amount Eligible for Cash Discount" 
,"Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Doc Type" 
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code" 
,"Last Inv. Item G/L Account Number" AS "G/L Account Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" 
,"Inv. Posting Document Date" AS "Posting Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" AS "Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date 1" AS "Last Cash Discount Due Date 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date 2" AS "Last Cash Discount Due Date 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" AS "Current Payment Block"
-- aggregated KPIsm
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))) AS "Days fro Since Last Activ"
FROM "defaultview-225"
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 10 desc
Limit 10 
 
Expected output result is in JSON format:
{
"signal_description": text of the Signal summary should be here
}
Do not output any other text, apart from the above JSON.
[/INST]
